messages.content: Create a simple React component for displaying user avatars with hover effects
Create a simple button component with loading state and click animation
Delete the simple-cursor-setup.js file that was causing settings.json overwrite issues
Analyze and fix all references to simple-cursor-setup.js after deletion - find files that reference it and update them properly
Create enhanced AAI rules for automatic dependency analysis when deleting or editing agents - analyze affected files and create comprehensive modification tasks
Test the enhanced dependency analysis system with a sample delete operation
Fix npm run task to terminate properly when finished instead of hanging
Test termination fix - this should exit properly
Test the echo task fix - should create fewer tasks
Final test - no more echo tasks should be created
Fix Cursor task detection - prevent all terminal commands from being detected as tasks by Cursor
Find all code that uses echo commands and replace them with printf to prevent Cursor task detection issues
